channel.title: Website Development Section
channel.description:
I realise that there is already a web development board on [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/]moparisthebest.com[/url] but I'd also see one here, I notice there aren't a lot of website developers in this part of the community, but there has been a growth in it recently, people have been asking more questions about website development and they're always looking for web developers. I think it'd be good for people such as myself who only know website languages and don't know much Java to stick around in.
I'd eventually like to see a category for website development, but that is something for moparisthebest.com, not for here.
Does anyone else share my views on this?

item.title: Website Development Section
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Alright, marking this as resolved then.

Read full topic

item.title: Website Development Section
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Yeah that’s fine, it was just a suggestion since I spend more time on here than I do on MITB, it would benefit me and I’m sure others more. I’ll just need to increase my activity on mitb.com haha.

Read full topic

item.title: Website Development Section
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Two other people have, in fact, posted this exact same suggestion. For lack of thorough repetition, we essentially said that there is no need for such a board here. Everything on this site is supposed to be specific to rs private servers. We have a few general boards as an exception, but they exist to encapsulate all other discussion that doesn’t fit in the rs boards. We tend not to create a lot of generic boards, as that further separates this forum from the mitb forum, which is not what we want to do.

I hope this answers the request.

Read full topic
